hero.title: Hum to any tune, get the song instantly
hero.description: HumToSong turns humming, whistling, or short clips into accurate song matches powered by ACRCloud and our latency tuned pipeline.
hero.tip: Supports vocal, humming and live recordings

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is HumToSong
introduce.label: Overview
introduce.description: HumToSong connects your melody to the original track in seconds. Upload a snippet or hum into the mic and receive precise matches with metadata, lyrics and streaming links.

items.title: Creator friendly
items.description: Designed for content creators, music lovers and support teams who need fast song identification.

items.title: ACRCloud powered
items.description: Native integration with ACRCloud ensures industry-grade recognition accuracy across global catalogs.

items.title: Realtime handoff
items.description: Stream results to your product via webhooks or SDKs with latency under 1.5 seconds.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.title: Why teams choose HumToSong
benefit.description: Give your users an effortless way to find any song they hum.

items.title: High accuracy
items.description: Hybrid fingerprinting catches the right track even with noisy backgrounds.

items.title: Fast integration
items.description: RESTful API and TypeScript SDKs drop into existing Next.js or mobile stacks.

items.title: Actionable metadata
items.description: Return ISRC, artists, streaming links and user-ready cover art in one call.

items.title: Capture audio
items.description: Upload a file or record 5â€“15 seconds of humming in the browser.

items.title: Match in the cloud
items.description: HumToSong forwards the snippet to ACRCloud and merges enriched metadata.

items.title: Deliver results
items.description: Receive ranked matches, confidence scores and links that plug into your app.

items.title: Measure impact
items.description: Analyze recognition stats and feedback inside the HumToSong dashboard.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Key capabilities
feature.description: Everything you need to build humming-first experiences.

items.title: Cross-device capture
items.description: Optimized recording widgets for web, iOS and Android.

items.title: Confidence scoring
items.description: Receive ordered matches with probability to power smart UX.

items.title: Lyrics enrichment
items.description: Optional lyric snippets and translations for fast content sourcing.

items.title: Multilingual support
items.description: UI copy available in English and Chinese out of the box.

items.title: Event webhooks
items.description: Notify your backend when a match is found or requires review.

items.title: Usage analytics
items.description: Track recognition volume, success rate and unresolved queries.

stats.name: stats
stats.label: Stats
stats.title: HumToSong by the numbers
stats.description: Fast, reliable and ready for production.

testimonial.name: testimonial
testimonial.label: Testimonials
testimonial.title: Product teams love the clarity
testimonial.description: Early partners are already shipping better music discovery.

items.title: Lena Ortiz
items.label: Head of Support, SingAlong
items.description: HumToSong plugs into our ticketing workflow so agents identify songs while talking to customers.

items.title: Raymond Chu
items.label: Founder, JamClips
items.description: Integration took one afternoon and detection accuracy stayed above 97% in noisy bars.

items.title: Emilia Novak
items.label: Product Manager, LoopRadio
items.description: We finally deliver real-time track info for live streams without manual tagging.

items.title: What audio formats are supported?
items.description: We accept WAV, MP3, M4A and direct microphone streams up to 60 seconds.

items.title: Do you store uploaded recordings?
items.description: Recordings are discarded after matching unless you enable retention for quality review.

items.title: How accurate is the recognition?
items.description: With clean humming HumToSong averages 97% top-1 accuracy across the global catalog.

items.title: Can we embed this in mobile apps?
items.description: Yes, use our Swift and Kotlin helpers or call the REST API directly.

items.title: Is there a free tier?
items.description: The MVP offers a generous sandbox with 200 monthly recognitions during beta.

items.title: How do pricing plans work?
items.description: Pay for the recognitions you use with automatic scale discounts past 50k matches.

cta.name: cta
cta.title: Bring humming recognition to your product
cta.description: Join the HumToSong beta and surprise users with instant matches.

brand.title: HumToSong
brand.description: HumToSong identifies any melody in seconds and streams rich metadata to your app.
